unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Festive Boost!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Festive Boost!**

unnormalised: Planning to finally buy that dream apartment in Mumbai before Diwali? Banks are rolling out some tempting home loan schemes!
normalised: Planning to finally buy that dream apartment in Mumbai before Diwali? Banks are rolling out some tempting home loan schemes!

unnormalised: State Bank of India (SBI) has announced special rates starting at just 8.5% for eligible applicants. HDFC Bank is also offering pre-approved loans with minimal paperwork - perfect for busy folks.
normalised: State Bank of India (S B I) has announced special rates starting at just eight point five percent for eligible applicants. H D F C Bank is also offering pre-approved loans with minimal paperwork - perfect for busy folks.

unnormalised: Heard whispers that ICICI Bank is throwing in a free home insurance policy if you apply before Ganesh Chaturthi! Now that's a sweet deal!
normalised: Heard whispers that I C I C I Bank is throwing in a free home insurance policy if you apply before Ganesh Chaturthi! Now that's a sweet deal!

unnormalised: Experts are advising potential buyers to compare interest rates and processing fees before jumping in. Don’t be like Raju from next door who got stuck with hidden charges, okay?
normalised: Experts are advising potential buyers to compare interest rates and processing fees before jumping in. Don’t be like Raju from next door who got stuck with hidden charges, okay?

unnormalised: Think of all the biryani you can cook in your new kitchen!
normalised: Think of all the biryani you can cook in your new kitchen!

unnormalised: Remember to factor in property registration costs and stamp duty, which can add a significant chunk to your expenses.
normalised: Remember to factor in property registration costs and stamp duty, which can add a significant chunk to your expenses.

unnormalised: This festive season might just be the perfect time to finally own a piece of Bharat! But, read all the fine print, yaar!
normalised: This festive season might just be the perfect time to finally own a piece of Bharat! But, read all the fine print, yaar!
